name: Dolla Avator Audit Tool
description: A user-friendly web app that simulates user interactions (login and gameplay) and performs vulnerability scanning using OWASP ZAP and Selenium.

ZAP_API_KEY.description: API Key for OWASP ZAP (if required). You can find or set this in ZAP under Tools > Options > API.

ZAP_ADDRESS.description: The address where OWASP ZAP is running. If using a local instance, use 127.0.0.1.

ZAP_PORT.description: The port OWASP ZAP is using (default is 8090).

FLASK_SECRET_KEY.description: Secret key for Flask session management.
